Message.Title: Bible Thumpers are WRONG About the Bible !
Message.Msg: The Bible says nothing about marriage between and man and a woman. So you Log Cabin Pubes can breath easier today. A trio of Iowa-based religious scholars penned an op-ed in a local paper this week, reminding readers that despite popular opinion, the Bible does not simply define marriage as between one man and one woman. Ultimately, said Cargill, a Biblical "argument against same-sex marriage is wholly unsustainable. We all know this, but very few scholars are talking about it, because they don't want to take the heat." So I guess now you maroons can only quote Rush, and not the bible.

Message.Title: Beck: "I wish I could take back everything I said"
Message.Msg: "For any role that I have played in dividing (the country), I wish I can take them back," Beck said. "I don't wish I could take back the truth that was spoken but perhaps — not perhaps — many times I could have said it differently." So basically, since very little he said was true and 99% was either paranoia, bigotry or both (and much more) he would like to take most of what he said back. LOL!
